summary: Tired of running to a merchant in the middle of an exploration tour because you exceeded your carryweight? Tired of setting the carryweight up via console everytime you load or reload? Then this is for you. The mod adds a persistent spell that lifts up your carryweight by 700,000.
descriptionHtml:
Tired of running to a merchant in the middle of an exploration tour because you exceeded your carryweight? Tired of setting the carryweight up via console everytime you load or reload? Then this is for you. The mod adds a persistent spell that lifts up your carryweight by 700,000.

---Installation---
Copy alle the files included with this mod into your Skyrim Data Folder

--Uninstallation---
Prior to remove the mod's files type "Stopquest CarryWeight" into the console, then remove CarryWeightExtended.bsa and CarryWeightExtended.esp from your Data folder.

View my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22090]Set of Spellbreakers[/url]
author: Norgur
